topic.title: Creating a custom ZeroNet address
topic.body: For example, ZeroMail starts with "1MaiL" and ZeroTalk starts with "1TaLk". I've seen programs that generate custom Bitcoin addresses like these. How does one generate addresses like this for ZeroNet?

1_1BGaNcH1UBqAdatPbT3YssmPRVdhepMNPW.body: PIA on OS X good. Ports being closed hasn't caused any issues.

1_1EUyJtat7mbu5wMcR6nrJTPBBRons1mtMA.body:
> [ekaterina](#comment_53_1Mk5sVKeCrwMc3wSD11jM7DZTiqF5D9BaD): Looks like it, oh boy, more users incoming I guess :)
> https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=11210590

This is how I found it. Quite a cool technical feat and very polished UI :)
